items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.title: vuhuuu11/react-accordion: A lightweight and accessible React accordion component with smooth animations.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: A lightweight, small, and easy to configure CSS framework engine.
items.title: tenoxui/tenoxui: A lightweight, small, and easy to configure CSS framework engine.

items.content_html: A mini Job‑Application Tracker (similar to a lightweight Trello board) where an authenticated user can add job opportunities and move each card through pipeline stages (Applied → Interview → Offer → Hired / Rejected) in real time.
items.title: abhishek-shigavan/job-application-tracker: A mini Job‑Application Tracker (similar to a lightweight Trello board) where an authenticated user can add job opportunities and move each card through pipeline stages (Applied → Interview → Offer → Hired / Rejected) in real time.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Backend: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js service for continuous recording of HLS audio streams (.m3u8). Automatically segments recordings by the hour, saves files with timestamped filenames (StreamName-weekday-14h.aac), and purges files older than 7 days. Built with FFmpeg and moment-timezone, configurable via JSON.
items.title: Saxho-tv/HLS-Stream-Recorder: A lightweight Node.js service for continuous recording of HLS audio streams (.m3u8). Automatically segments recordings by the hour, saves files with timestamped filenames (StreamName-weekday-14h.aac), and purges files older than 7 days. Built with FFmpeg and moment-timezone, configurable via JSON.

items.title: melloware/coloris-npm: A lightweight and elegant JavaScript color picker.

items.content_html: Lightweight library that converts user-defined formulas into SQL or JavaScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible HTTP/WebSocket API module that implements the interface API of antelopejs.
items.title: AntelopeJS/api: A lightweight, flexible HTTP/WebSocket API module that implements the interface API of antelopejs.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
items.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
